short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you checkout & ship items from most Ecommerces abroad using Click&Buy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you want to buy anything from the oversees through any common online shop like Amazon and get it delivered safely to your door step? We got you covered! Simply download Click&Buy chrome extension, visit www.amazon.com, search for a product of your choice and view it, you will see Click&Buy popup from the top of your browser, click our checkout button and complete the checkout process and leave the rest to us. That's all! Currently available in Kenya only.
